/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on determining the effective dates of claims involving payment under
38 U.S.C. 5110(j)
, including
claims filed more than one year after the initial report or finding
claims received within one year of the report of actual death
, and
a finding of presumptive death corrected by a report of actual death
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section E - Allowance, Allotments, or Service Pay Under 38 U.S.C. 5110(j)
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section E
